question: 社会
sourceMnemonic: Not to be confused with <ja>会社</ja>, which is a company, this is <vocabulary>society</vocabulary>. When a <kanji>company</kanji> <kanji>meet</kanji>s together, it's like a bunch of people, who are in groups, who come together to live in one world. That is a <vocabulary>society</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
